description: Discover how Opulus is transforming the music royalties landscape using blockchain and NFTs. This innovative platform offers decentralized, transparent solutions for musicians and investors alike, promising a new era of financial control and monetization in the music industry.
keywords: Opulus, music royalties, NFTs, blockchain, decentralized finance, music industry, artist empowerment, investment opportunities, music monetization
title: The Rise of Opulus: Transforming Music Royalties through NFTs
